Novi Sad, a company with the seat at Novosadskog sajma 2, Novi Sad, Serbia (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"the Company\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") now part of EPAM Systems, Inc. and the EPAM Group of Companies (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") recognizes our employees' right to privacy. We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain individually identifiable information about you (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"personal information\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you are processed and the means we use to carry such processing activities out. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pursuant to Art. 23 of the Personal Data Protection Act (\\\"Official Gazette of the Republic of Serbia\\\" no. 87/2018), we are required to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice. It is important that you read this privacy notice so that you are aware of how and why we process your personal data.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
